statements: SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT username, email FROM customers WHERE email IS NOT NULL
SELECT full_name FROM customers WHERE username = 'john_doe'
SELECT customer_id, full_name FROM customers ORDER BY full_name ASC
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE password = 'secure_password'
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT full_name, email FROM customers WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT customer_id, username, email FROM customers WHERE full_name = 'Alice Smith';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, full_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, username, email FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'John';
SELECT last_name, first_name FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM account_details WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, account_type, balance FROM account_details ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT account_id, account_type, balance FROM account_details WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, username, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN account_details ON customers.customer_id = account_details.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT username, email FROM customers;
SELECT full_name, email, username FROM customers ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT card_number, expiration_date FROM credit_cards WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, street_address, city, state, zip_code FROM addresses WHERE state='California';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT full_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT username FROM customers WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT c.full_name, a.city FROM customers c JOIN addresses a ON c.customer_id = a.customer_id;
SELECT c.username, cc.card_number, a.zip_code FROM customers c JOIN credit_cards cc ON c.customer_id = cc.customer_id JOIN addresses a ON c.customer_id = a.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM login_credentials WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY email;
SELECT customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT c.first_name, a.street_address, a.city, a.state, a.postal_code FROM customers c JOIN addresses a ON c.customer_id = a.customer_id WHERE c.last_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY c.first_name, a.city;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, o.order_date, o.total_amount FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id WHERE o.total_amount < 500 ORDER BY c.last_name ASC, o.order_date DESC;

SELECT * FROM addresses WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT customer_id, username FROM login_credentials ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 100 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
